scripts.codegen: mkdir -p src/gen && protoc -I protos -I node_modules/google-proto-files --ts_proto_out=src/gen --ts_proto_opt=outputServices=grpc-js,env=node,esModuleInterop=true,forceLong=long,importSuffix=.js protos/api/api.proto
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run codegen && pnpm run -s check-dirty && pnpm run build
scripts.check-dirty: git diff --quiet -- src/gen || (echo 'Codegen produced diffs. Commit them.' && exit 1)
